mapper.insert: INSERT into oto (otitle, userid, odetail) VALUES (#{otitle}, #{userid}, #{odetail} )
mapper.select:
SELECT o.qono qono, o.otitle otitle, o.userid userid, o.odetail odetail, o.oregdate oregdate, of.fileName fileName, a.userid userid
FROM oto o LEFT JOIN otofile of ON o.qono = of.qono JOIN GH_User a ON o.userid = a.userid WHERE o.qono = #{qono};
